__TOC__



A successful visual identity has to be consistent, recognizable and powerful.

The <nowiki>[[http://www.canonical.com/files/ubuntu_brandmark_guidelines_v2.pdf|Official Brand Guideline]]</nowiki> includes all the artwork you could need for your site. It also includes a set of tips designed to help all of us create a professional, powerful, precise and consistent brand identity.

Please take the time to understand how to apply it correctly.

You can find more logos, patterns and artwork for your project at <nowiki>[[http://design.canonical.com/the-toolkit/ubuntu-brand-guidelines/|here]]</nowiki>.

If that isn't enough go to the <nowiki>[[Artwork|Artwork Team]]</nowiki> or send a message to:
